name: SOMEDUDE234'S EPIC QUIZ SHOW!
description:
One day, your school is throwing a show! and you need to get all 7 quiz papers, but be careful! Somedude234 won't be in a good mood when you get an answer wrong! And the other kids (and staff) are roaming the school!

Sorry if the mod looks like a Garrett clone, I just wanted to do one...
